alert.note: Alert for Northern Nassau (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 3:18PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Nassau County through 345 PM EDT... At 317 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Manhasset, or over Great Neck, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Glen Cove, Syosset, Great Neck, Oyster Bay, Port Washington, Woodbury, Manhasset, Bayville, Brookville, Sands Point, Jericho, East Hills, Manorhaven, Kings Point and Sea Cliff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
